item.description:
Okay guys, we're headed to Fresh Pond Cinemas for Horton!

Current plan (apt to change with group vote):

We'll head to the 7:30 showing of Horton (runs about 1 and 1/2 hours getting us out at 9 p.m.)

For those able, we'll meet b/w 5:45 and 6 p.m. at the Bertucci's (see below for address) at the Alewife T-station for dinner. That'll given us an hour and a 1/2 to eat and get over to the theater. We can't get tix online, but if you let me know definitively that you're coming to the movie, I'll swing by and pick up tix on my way to Bertucci's. Email me (doclmeet@yahoo.com) or call me (will provide cell phone this weekend), to confirm you want a ticket.

Bertucci's-Alewife, MA
5 Cambridge Park Dr.
Alewife T station
Cambridge, MA 02140
617-876-2200

Can't wait!!
item.name: Horton Hears a Who--- The Movie!!!
